biotools.summary: Alternative polyadenylation (APA) is an important post-transcriptional regulation mechanism which occurs in most human genes. This tool facilitates the discovery of novel APA sites from RNAseq data by leveraging cleanUpdTSeq to fine tune identified APA sites.

bioschemas.name: InPAS
bioschemas.summary: Alternative polyadenylation (APA) is an important post-transcriptional regulation mechanism which occurs in most human genes. This tool facilitates the discovery of novel APA sites from RNAseq data by leveraging cleanUpdTSeq to fine tune identified APA sites.
